name: ...And NOW You're Dead
description:
... And NOW You're Dead

Your life as a happy Elf is about to end as you know it. You always had peaceful images of the afterlife, but it turns out it's a bit stranger than you imagined...

Have some fun with this classic space-shooter, and post your top score in the comments!

Controls

Use the arrows or WASD to move. Easy!

NOTE: The controls are more responsive in the Win/Mac build. On my browser they are a bit laggy (movement often continues a bitafter releasing a key). This might depend on the browser/system, not sure.

Development
  • Design, music and programming by Gonzalo Perez de la Ossa.

This submission was a bit rushed in the end, maybe the scope was a bit too much for the time I had during these 10 days. I aimed to have a playable and fun space-shooter by the end of it, I hope I've succeeded!

I had fun playing with Cinemachine transitions and dolly tracks, as well as coding the enemy behaviour (I would have like to do more there, but totally ran out of time). I also enjoyed making the music for this one (I am a musician after all...).
